unnormalised: Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are Your Followers Just *Dekhne Wale*?
normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Are Your Followers Just Dekhne Wale?

unnormalised: Ever wondered if your Instagram followers are actually listening to your *gyan*, or are they just another faceless number? Follower analytics are your digital Kundali, revealing all!
normalised: Ever wondered if your Instagram followers are actually listening to your gyan, or are they just another faceless number? Follower analytics are your digital Kundali, revealing all!

unnormalised: Platforms are stepping up their game, offering insights beyond just vanity metrics like follower count. Think deep dives into engagement rates, audience demographics (Shoutout to the Bangalore crowd!), and even the best times to post that perfect chai-time meme (around 16:00 hrs, apparently!).
normalised: Platforms are stepping up their game, offering insights beyond just vanity metrics like follower count. Think deep dives into engagement rates, audience demographics (Shoutout to the Bangalore crowd!), and even the best times to post that perfect chai-time meme (around sixteen hundred hours, apparently!).

unnormalised: For budding influencers from Mumbai to Madras, understanding these analytics is crucial. It helps you tailor content, target your audience (maybe focus on Gen Z, who are glued to their phones until 02:00 AM!), and prove your ROI to potential sponsors. Remember that partnership with Haldiram's last year? Knowing which posts resonated can land you the next big deal.
normalised: For budding influencers from Mumbai to Madras, understanding these analytics is crucial. It helps you tailor content, target your audience (maybe focus on Gen Z, who are glued to their phones until two AM!), and prove your R O I to potential sponsors. Remember that partnership with Haldiram's last year? Knowing which posts resonated can land you the next big deal.

unnormalised: Consider tools like SocialPilot or even free insights offered by the platforms themselves. Dig in! After all, as they say, *jo dikhta hai, wohi bikta hai* - but what *dikhta* should be strategically planned, based on data, since 15/08/1947. Don't leave your social media destiny to chance. Get analyzing since yesterday.
